.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Storage.Models.StorageQueue Create(class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Storage.IQueueOperations operations, string resourceGroupName, string accountName, string queueName, class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<string, string> metadata) cil managed

<Extension()> Public Function Create (operations As IQueueOperations, resourceGroupName As String, accountName As String, queueName As String, Optional metadata As IDictionary(Of String, String) = Nothing) As StorageQueue

static member Create : Microsoft.Azure.Management.Storage.IQueueOperations * string * string * string * System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string, string> -> Microsoft.Azure.Management.Storage.Models.StorageQueue

Docs.param: The operations group for this extension method.
The name of the resource group within the user's subscription. The name is case insensitive.
The name of the storage account within the specified resource group. Storage account names must be between 3 and 24 characters in length and use numbers and lower-case letters only.

A queue name must be unique within a storage account and must be between 3 and 63 characters.The name must comprise of lowercase alphanumeric and dash(-) characters only, it should begin and end with an alphanumeric character and it cannot have two consecutive dash(-) characters.
A name-value pair that represents queue metadata.
Docs.summary: Creates a new queue with the specified queue name, under the specified account.
